## Description {#details}

This file declares the IRTranslator pass.

This pass is responsible for translating LLVM IR into MachineInstr. It uses target hooks to lower the ABI but aside from that, the pass generated code is generic. This is the default translator used for GlobalISel.

  title="Todo"
  permalink="/docs/api/pages/todo/#_todo000001">

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Technically the pass should run on an hypothetical MachineModule,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since it should translate Global into some sort of MachineGlobal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The MachineGlobal should ultimately just be a transfer of ownership of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the interesting bits that are relevant to represent a global value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That being said, we could investigate what would it cost to just duplicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the information from the LLVM IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The idea is that ultimately we would be able to free up the memory used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the LLVM IR as soon as the translation is over.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\name Methods for translating form LLVM IR to MachineInstr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see ::translate for general information on the translate methods.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Translate \\p Inst into its corresponding MachineInstr instruction(s).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Insert the newly translated instruction(s) right where the CurBuilder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The general algorithm is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 Look for a virtual register for each operand or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    create one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 Update the VMap accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2.alt. For constant arguments, if they are compile time constants,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   produce an immediate in the right operand and do not touch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ValToReg. Actually we will go with a virtual register for each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   constants because it may be expensive to actually materialize the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   constant. Moreover, if the constant spans on several instructions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   CSE may not catch them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   =&gt; Update ValToVReg and remember that we saw a constant in Constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   We will materialize all the constants in finalize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: we would need to do something so that we can recognize such operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       as constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 Create the generic instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return true if the translation succeeded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> translate(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Materialize \\p C into virtual-register \\p Reg. The generic instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// performing this materialization will be inserted into the entry block of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return true if the materialization succeeded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> translate(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Examine any debug-info attached to the instruction (in the form of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DbgRecords) and translate it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// When an invoke or a cleanupret unwinds to the next EH pad, there are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the Machine IR predecessors for the given IR CFG edge. Usually</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preceding the original though (e.g. switch instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 1&gt;</a> getMachinePredBBs(CFGEdge Edge) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemappedEdge = MachinePreds.find(Edge);</span></CodeLine>
